text: Zhang Mi (, born 930, date of death unknown), was a Chinese Ci lyric poet who lived during the Later Shu. He was one of the chief poets of that group influenced by Wen Tingyun which became known as the "School Amid Flowers". Translators of his verse include Herbert Giles and Qiu Xiaolong. ==Notes== Category:930 births Category:Later Shu people Category:Three Hundred Tang Poems poets Category:Year of death unknown
title: Zhang Mi
